channel.title: Mobile sACN
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: v0.2.0
item.description: - New help system, accessible from the mobile interface, in the base program, and [online](https://docs.mobilesacn.dankeenan.org/). - Fix some startup crashes related to error reporting. - Fix macOS packages.
